name: Microwave Simulator 3D Timer
description:
Ever wonder what would happen if you put a burger in the microwave? How about a chicken and pizza? Now you can safely and easily find out with Microwave It! Impress your friends with by putting items in your virtual microwave and watch them fizz, sparkle, explode, and do all kinds of exciting things!,Like bake your favorite pizza Recipes in much shorter time,,and there are many things with which you can do baking.This is really master chef simulation.you can grilled your chicken,can bake your bread and much more in the same manner..only set the right time for your item,and then enjoy the meal.


Features:

Cute pixel environment
Different pizza recipes
Multiple complex tasks
Addictive management game
